channel.title: Maxwell Jensen's Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content on Maxwell Jensen's Personal Website

item.title: Are We Entering a Post-European World?
item.description: With the suicide of western powers, doubling down on chasing civilisational dead-ends, is it time to call it game?

item.title: Age of Weimarica
item.description: With the assassination of Charlie Kirk, I sensed the start of a great evil to come.

item.title: Prison vs. Public Education
item.description: I have heard statements from ex-convicts that prison is a better environment than public school. I agree.

item.title: Debunking the Anti-AI Cult
item.description: Is AI the first stepping stone to an utopia, or the downfall of civilisation as we know it? There's a lot to be said, but let's address the doom and gloom.

item.title: Norway vs. EU: Shooting Itself in the Foot?
item.description: Does Norway staying out of the EU ultimately fail to achieve Norway's self-stated goal of 'independence' and 'liberty?' I think so. Here's why.

item.title: My Life in Norway, and Why I Moved On
item.description: I want to talk a bit about some important decisions I undertook recently in my life.

item.title: AI on Fedora
item.description: This article goes through some technical details of getting certain Fedora-specific problems out of the way when setting up your AI on Fedora.

item.title: Creating a Website
item.description: In this beginner's guide, we will go through the simplest method of creating a statically generated website, which you can host anywhere easily, using Hugo.

item.title: Licensing for Beginners
item.description: Here's how to correctly licence your software, and what licensing means to begin with.
